sectionIntro.title: Hello, my name is Améluc Ahognidjè and I am a Web Developer/Data Analyst.
text: Enjoy your tour of my gallery.

sectionWA.title: My Web apps
text: Here you can find the websites I built.
They were all taken care of thoroughly.
Building is something a really enjoy and to try more design, I borrowed ideas from some people.
Their references reside in the corresponding design if any interest you.

sectionDA.title: My Data Analysis
text: This part is where I hold some data notebooks I made.
All the data I used are actual data and I will be updating them regularly.
Maybe you can find some useful.

sectionAbout.title: Who I am
text: As you can see, I try to be the most versatile.
I am always enjoyed to try & learn new things.
Whenever you have ideas about a design, I will be honored to make it come true.
Or maybe is it a analyse of some data you need?
Whether it is financial (my domain), academic, I can help you.
I am quick to grasp new concepts.
That's what help me get some freeCodeCamp.org's certifications.
That's what also help me obtain my bachelor in Audit & Management Control.

sectionContact.title: Get in touch
text: Send me a message, so we can discuss about growth opportunities coming from our collaboration.
